metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6869 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: A `<dialog>` element could have been manipulated to paint contentoutside of a sandboxed iframe. This could allow untrusted content todisplay under the guise of trusted content. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
